item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: June 8, 2023 Today's Verse Proverbs 10:4–5 [4] A slack hand causes poverty, but the hand of the diligent makes rich. [5] He who gathers in summer is a prudent son, but he who sleeps in harvest is a son who brings shame. Today's Memory Verse James 1:22 - But be doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving yourselves. John 14:6 - Jesus said to him, “I am the way, and the truth, and the life.
